pasugiya pas wasara thula di janashakthi samagama gewa athi mupa rakshana wandi himikam rupiyal biliyana 14 ikmawana athara wandi himikam gewimwala shigha්ra wadiwimak memagin pennum karayi. 2005 wasaredi rupiyal biliyana 5 kda, 2006 di rupiyal biliyana 2.13 k da, 2007 di rupiyal biliyana 2.34 k da, 2008 di rupiyal biliyana 2.36 kda gewa atha.

me athara sithawaka aayojana kalapaye karmantha shalawaka sewayata yana ‘sudu hansi’ nawathath ohu hamuwi pawasa aththe ayata ohuwa nodaka sitimata nohaki bawin ema karmantha shalawema rakiyawata ena lesaya.

api eyatath mokak hari thanathurak demu kiyaya.gnyathi sangraha nam koyi wele karaganna barida putha dan balanna oona dipu poronduwalin ekak dekakwath karala danna thamayi kiya trampat ekapara muna haputu karagaththeya.
me lipiya pala kale mita wasarakata ihathadiya.
me grahakaya pruthiwi wayugolayata athuluwanathuruma kisiwakuth ee gana dana sitiye natha.

mema dosha yedena aakara rashiyak atha.wandambau doshalamakaghalakasaghasthri kendraye 7,8 sthana wala kuja,shani,rahu,kethu wani papa grahayan wadi pramanayak sitimath purusha kendraye 7,8 sthanawala papin nathiwima ha papi graha drushthi nathiwima purusha maraka yogayaki.larakasaghalaramakaghalamakaghalakasagha kendrayaka hatha ata adhipathi grahayan dedena yogawa ho pariwarthanaya wi(hatha adhipathi ateth ata adhipathi hatheth sitima) sitina kendrawalata elesama athi kendra wiwahayata gatha yuthuya.nathnam wandambauwe.larakasaghalaramakaghalamakaghalakasagha mesha ho wrushchika rashigatha chandraya papa grahayanta madiwi(chandrayage anshakayata depasin aasannaye papa grahayan sitima) sitima wandambau doshayaki.larakasaghalaramakaghalamakaghalakasagha sthri kendraye hatha adhipathi grahaya dubalawa papin samaga yogawa ho papa drushthiwa haya ata ho dolahe pihitima wandambau doshayaki.larakasaghalaramakaghabahu wiwaha doshalamakaghalakasagha kendrayaka hath wannadhipathiya sikuru samaga yogawa (hatha adhipathi sikuru wana wita sikuru grahayawa salakayi.)

yakshayan ha dewiyan adahima prag bauddha yugaye sitama shri lankawe pawathi aagamika wishwasa wu bawa mahawansaye thorathuru athi athara yakshayan ha dewiyan lesa adahimata lakwa aththe balangoda manawayagen pawatha ena ape aadimawasi janaya bawath, owungen me dakwa noyindul pawatha ena deshiya aadiwasi janaya wu waddan yakun ha dewiyan adahanne owunge mi muththanta gaurawa kirimak washayeni.

wipakshaya pawasana paridi aarthikaya kadawatima wani karanawalata wagakiwayuththe janadhipathiwaraya nowedayi madhyawediyaku wimasu wita eya thaman pilinoganna bawa pawasu hitapu widesha amathyawaraya, eeta wagakiwayuththe agamathi ranil wikramasinha mahatha bawata chodana kaleya.
